item.title: Basics of Optimization LP, QP, SQP, DP and When to Use Them
item.description:
author: “Antonio Tong” date: 2017-12-30 linktitle: Water Cooler Talk on Optimization: LP, QP, SQP, DP, … menu: main: title: Water Cooler Talk on Optimization: LP, QP, SQP, DP, … description: This post summarizes some of the basics of optimization weight: 10

Introduction

Optimization is a programmic process to minimize or maximize a deifned objective function by tuning the deisgn variables bounded by a set of constraints. In the field of energy engineering, many problems can be discribed as an optimization problem:
